test.description: Name of the test administered, as specific as possible (eg. Archer, NGS, IHC)

datasource.description: Name of the source system from which the data came (eg. PALGA, DNA-DB)

testedGenes.description: List of genes that were tested.

gene.description: Gene involved in this result. (eg. KRAS)

ihcResult.description: Full result string of IHC test ie. (eg. PD-L1 weak positive 20%)

hgvsProteinImpact.description: HGVS notation describing protein impact ie. (eg. p.G12V)

hgvsCodingImpact.description: HGVS notation describing coding impact ie. (eg. c.4375C>T)

transcript.description: Transcript referenced in other positional attributes (eg. NM_004304.5)

fusionGeneUp.description: Upstream gene of a fusion (eg. EML4)

fusionGeneDown.description: Downstream gene of a fusion (eg. ALK)

exonsSkipStart.description: Exons skipped in a structural variant start (eg. 18)

exonsSkipEnd.description: Exons skipped in a structural variant end (eg. 20)

position.description: Genomic position where this result was detected (eg. chr1:1234567)

noMutationsFound.description: Flag should be set to indicate a negative result for a gene (ie. nothing was found)

freeText.description: Free text for a test result which does not fit into any of the other fields. This value will be curated.
